casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Smakula.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Smakula (1988), 39 Ohio St. 3d 143.]

(No. D.D. 88-6 — Submitted July 27, 1988 — Decided October 19, 1988.) *145J. Warren Bettis, disciplinary counsel, and Mark H. Aultman, for relator. " Gold, Rotatori, Schwartz & Gibbons Co., L.P.A., and Gerald S. Gold, for respondent. Per Curiam.

This court concurs in the board’s findings and its recommendation. Respondent is hereby suspended from the practice of law in Ohio for one year. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.
